unnormalised: Yo, Influencer Marketing is on FIRE! Seriously, brands are lining up like aunties at a wedding buffet to collab with social media stars.
normalised: Yo, Influencer Marketing is on fire! Seriously, brands are lining up like aunties at a wedding buffet to collaborate with social media stars.

unnormalised: The latest buzz? "Desi Diaries," a clothing brand from Jaipur, just dropped a limited-edition Onam collection with Kerala-based fashion influencer, Meera Nair. Think vibrant kasavu sarees with a modern twist, all over Insta!
normalised: The latest buzz? "Desi Diaries," a clothing brand from Jaipur, just dropped a limited-edition Onam collection with Kerala-based fashion influencer, Meera Nair. Think vibrant kasavu sarees with a modern twist, all over Instagram!

unnormalised: And it's not just fashion. Even biryani joints are getting in on the action. "Hyderabadi Handi," a popular chain, teamed up with food blogger Rohan Verma to create the 'Rohan's Royal Biryani,' available for a limited time across all their 25 branches.
normalised: And it's not just fashion. Even biryani joints are getting in on the action. "Hyderabadi Handi," a popular chain, teamed up with food blogger Rohan Verma to create the 'Rohan's Royal Biryani,' available for a limited time across all their twenty five branches.

unnormalised: Experts say these collaborations are boosting brand awareness by up to 30% and driving sales like crazy. It's all about reaching that sweet spot with authentic content.
normalised: Experts say these collaborations are boosting brand awareness by up to thirty percent and driving sales like crazy. It's all about reaching that sweet spot with authentic content.

unnormalised: Remember that disastrous "Sharmaji Ka Beta" campaign last year? Yeah, brands are learning to listen to their influencers and fans now.
normalised: Remember that disastrous "Sharmaji Ka Beta" campaign last year? Yeah, brands are learning to listen to their influencers and fans now.

unnormalised: So, if you've got the followers, now's your chance to shine! Time to cash in, darlings! Rs. are waiting!
normalised: So, if you've got the followers, now's your chance to shine! Time to cash in, darlings! Rupees are waiting!
